description: Numbers != 2 (mod 4) listed in order of increasing totient function phi (A000010).
references: L. C. Washington, Introduction to Cyclotomic Fields, Springer, p. 353.
mathematica: Sort[Select[Range[100], Mod[#, 4] != 2 &], EulerPhi[#1] <= EulerPhi[#2] &] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Apr 01 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
